remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  The domain of ` recs ` is ordinal. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Alan Sare, 11-Mar-2008.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem8 $p |- Ord dom recs ( F ) $.
$d F f x y $.
